sentences.en: Aluminium borate melting block was prepared combination of boric acid, anhydrous alum and potassium sulfate.
sentences.cn: 采用硼酸和无水明矾及硫酸钾压块 、 焙烧、制备硼酸铝熔块.

sentences.en: Ammonia, also known as anhydrous ammonia, a colorless liquid.
sentences.cn: 液氨, 又称为无水氨, 是一种无色液体.

sentences.en: Anhydrous ammonia must be incorporated ( and well sealed ) in all crops.
sentences.cn: 在夏季作物上施用尿素,把尿素和土壤掺混 施用 有好处,但在冬季作物上则不然.

sentences.en: Anhydrous nitric acid is dissociated.
sentences.cn: 无水硝酸是电离的.

sentences.en: Aspirin is synthesized through O - acylating reaction from acid and anhydride acid with anhydrous carbonate as catalyst.
sentences.cn: 以水杨酸和乙酸酐为原料,采用无水碳酸钠作为催化剂经O - 酰化反应合成了阿司匹林.

sentences.en: During ionic polymerization and group transfer polymerization, the absolute need to be transferred to the reactor anhydrous reagents.
sentences.cn: 在进行离子型聚合和基团转移聚合时，需要将绝对无水试剂转移到反应装置。

sentences.en: Fuel blends containing gasoline, anhydrous methanol and some solvents have been developed and used for automobile engines.
sentences.cn: 汽油、无水甲醇与某些溶剂的混合液已被用作汽车发动机的燃料。

sentences.en: H 2 O can turn anhydrous copper ( II ) sulphate solid from white to blue.
sentences.cn: 水可把无水的硫酸铜 ( II ) 固体由白色变成蓝色.

sentences.en: However, anhydrous ammonia is also toxic, corrosive, and flammable.
sentences.cn: 但是, 含水氨还是有毒 、 腐蚀性和可燃的.

sentences.en: Hydrogen partition coefficients between nominally anhydrous minerals and basaltic melts.
sentences.cn: 名义上的无水矿石和玄武岩熔点之间的氢分割系数.

sentences.en: If not, anhydrous alcohol and carbon tetrachloride are feasible.
sentences.cn: 如果没有，无水酒精和四氯化碳都是可行的。

sentences.en: In some ways, anhydrous ammonia is just as safe to handle as gasoline.
sentences.cn: 在某种程度上说, 无水氨使用起来与汽油一样安全.

sentences.en: It is prepared by reacting anhydrous ammonia and carbon dioxide gas under very high pressure in the presence of a suitable catalyst.
sentences.cn: 它是在某种催化剂参与下，由无水氨和二氧化碳气体在高压条件下反应生成的。

sentences.en: Methanol dehydrogenation is a promising route for commercial production of anhydrous formaldehyde.
sentences.cn: 甲醇直接脱氢制无水甲醛是具有工业化前景的新工艺.

sentences.en: Preparation: empty cartridge , syringes, anhydrous alcohol, even for the exclusive use of ( preferably ).
sentences.cn: 绸缪的工具: 不满不朱盒 、 注射器 、 无火酒不粗 、 不断不求 ( 最坏是兼用的 ).

sentences.en: Such vegetal essences as yeast and peony and anhydrous caffeine can constantly take effect in sensitive eye skin and restrain the production of melanin.
sentences.cn: 酵母精华、牡丹精华等植物精华与无水咖啡因能持续作用于敏感的眼部肌肤，同时抑制黑色素的生成。

sentences.en: The invention relates to a novel method of preparing anhydrous crystalline maltitol.
sentences.cn: 本发明讲述了一种无水结晶麦芽糖醇的制造方法.

sentences.en: The mixture mentioned had a good anhydrous and transparent effect.
sentences.cn: 该混合剂具有良好的脱水和透明作用.

sentences.en: This article described the crystal model of anhydrous sodium sulfate in DTB crystallizer.
sentences.cn: 论述了用DTB型结晶器结晶硫酸钠结晶模型.

sentences.en: This invention is improved production method for ammonia spirit or anhydrous ammonia.
sentences.cn: 本发明是制取浓氨水或无水氨的改进方法.

trans.tran_en: containing no water, esp no water of crystallization
